CustomField.description: An identifier for this record generated by the system that is available in 'before insert' context to allow linking of log records to Salesforce records when they do not yet have a Salesforce given id.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An identifier for this record generated by the system that is available in 'before insert' context to allow linking of log records to Salesforce records when they do not yet have a Salesforce given id.
CustomField.label: Record UUID
